section.title: Exercise: Using Retrolambda in your Android project
Create project
section.para: Create a new Android project with the top level project name com.vogella.android.retrolambda . Add a button to the existing layout with the @+id/button" ID.

section.title: Add Retrolambda to your Gradle build configuratoin
section.para: Add the me.tatarka:gradle-retrolambda plug-in as dependency to your build.gradle file.
Add the source and target compatibility to Java 8 and apply the new plug-in in your app/build.gradle file.

section.title: Validate setup by using a lambda expressions
section.para: Using the lambda configuration by using it with your button to show a Toast once the button is clicked.
